titlepage.subtitle:
A Collection in
The University of Virginia Archives

titlepage.publisher: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

archdesc.runner: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, University of Virginia Library
did.unittitle:
Papers of the Secretary of the Board of Visitors of the University of Virginia
1966-2000
did.physdesc: This collection consists of ca. 15,000 items.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: For ten years from the date of creation, access to these records will be granted only under the procedures of the Virginia Freedom of Information Act (Code of Virginia -2.1-340 ff.) or with the specific permission of the Secretary of the Board. Researchers interested in obtaining access to these records should direct a request in writing to the Office of the Legal Adviser, Madison Hall, University of Virginia.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Papers of the Secretary of the Board of Visitors of the University of Virginia, Accession #RG 1/2/1.001, Special Collections, University of Virginia Library, Charlottesville, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: This collection was transferred by Jeanne F. Bailes, Clerk of the Board of Visitors, Office of the Board of Visitors, The Rotunda, University of Virginia on 2000 August 9.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Information
bioghist.p: During the time span of these papers, Raymond C. Bice, Jr. (1969-1990) and Alexander G. Gilliam, Jr. (1991- ) both held the position of Secretary to the Board of Visitors.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The papers consist of general records of the Secretary, including correspondence, memoranda, and related papers. Present is correspondence and materials related to affirmative action and the Qatar Project.
